items.first: What you learn during practice <bold>doesn't come back in full detail later</bold>
items.second: Logging feels tedious, so <bold>your practice records don't last</bold>
items.third: When you want to review, <bold>you can't find the practice record you need</bold>

futureFeatures.body: You will also be able to interact with practitioners around the globe. Our community features are on the way, so stay tuned!
futureFeatures.imageAlt: Illustration of aikido practitioners worldwide connecting through devices

easeOfUse.question: Q. I am not confident with smartphones. Is it still easy?
easeOfUse.answer: A. Yes. The interface is designed for <bold>effortless operation</bold>, even if you rarely use smartphones. You can enlarge the text size whenever you need.

security.question: Q. Will my notes disappear or be seen by others?
security.answer: A. Your records stay safe in the cloud. We use secure protocols so your data remains protected from unauthorized access.

languages.question: Q. Is the service limited to Japanese users?
languages.answer: A. Not at all. The app is fully available in <bold>Japanese and English</bold> for aikido practitioners worldwide.

mobileApp.question: Q. Is there a native mobile app?
mobileApp.answer: A. A mobile app is coming soon. We will contact you via the email you registered as soon as it launches.

others.question: Q. How can I ask other questions?
others.answer: A. Please reach out through the <underlined><link>Help & Contact</link></underlined> form and we will get back to you.
